about_the_game:
Overview:

Legends of Duels is a real-time multiplayer Combar Trading Card Game (TCG). Select champions with diverse abilities, build your deck, and engage in strategic duels against players worldwide. Both new players and seasoned veterans will find challenges in Legends of Duels unique specializations, potent cards, and evolving strategies. Engage in intense battles and climb the ranks as you master the duel. Legends of Duels awaits your challenge.

Key Features:


Engaging Combat System
Experience thrilling, strategic card duels that test your thinking and decision-making skills.

Diverse Champions
Choose champions with unique abilities, aligning with different specializations like Fire, Water, Earth, and the newly introduced Electric Mage.

Expansive Card Collection
Collect and upgrade hundreds of cards, unlocking new strategies and combinations as you progress.

Competitive Multiplayer
Challenge players globally in real-time turn-based matches, climbing the leaderboards to prove your skill.

Regular Updates
Enjoy new cards, champions, specializations, and modes through regular updates, keeping Legends of Duels fresh and captivating.

Unleash your inner strategist in Legends of Duels magical realm. With complex gameplay, diverse champions, and a vast card collection, this TCG will have you coming back for more.

Ready to master the elements and claim victory in the ultimate card battle? Join Legends of Duels now!

COMMUNITY


About the Game

ext_user_account_notice: Legends of Duels (Supports Linking to Steam Account)
name: Legends of Duels

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8/81., Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-530 / AMD A6-3650
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce 9600GT / AMD Radeon HD 6570 / Intel HD 4600 Integrated Graphics (DirectX 10)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3300 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 560 / AMD Radeon HD 6950 / Intel UHD 630 Integrated Graphics (DirectX 11)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Legends of Duels is a real-time multiplayer TCG where champions with unique abilities engage in strategic duels. Build your deck and challenge the world!
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
